Text: No subs are coming up when I play it D= I have never had this problem before, what am I doing wrong?

If you're looking for good english subs or decent, don't download this. While you're downloading, try clicking on File Info in the utorrent GUI and you'll see a lot of the videos are tagged with [Horrible Subs]. That's there for a reason...
lol horriblesubs is the group that rips teh subs from Crunchyroll,
that means.. there is NO SUBTITLES?? :D

i know how to get subs, get divx player and then when your watching this press s it will show subtitles. if you still dont get it press the help tab and click on keyboard shortcuts and search next subtitle track
